resources.string: Hide Patcher From Other Apps\n(Require Xposed And Won\'t Work in VXP/Non Root)
Please Grant All Permissions To Use This Option...

Internal Storage Location Is Not Set!

By Default Patcher's Working Internal Storage Location Is :- 
'%1$s'

If It Is Okay Then Press 'CANCEL' Or If You Want To Change Then Press 'SELECT LOCATION' To Select Folder For Patcher's Work.

This Location Will Be Used For Patcher Work.
PS Location Can Also Be Reselect In Settings.

NOTE :- Selecting WRONG Location May Lead To Crashes Or Patcher May Fail In Some Tasks.
Please Select Internal Storage Location First Then Click Option Again To Proceed..
Please Restart The App For Changes To Take Effect!!
Please Wait Let It Check Server..
Internet Is Not Available Can\'t Proceed..

Note :- Unpatch Can Only Be Done In \'Code Patch\',\'License Patch\' And \'Hook Patch\',So It Is Not Available In \'Dalvik Patch\',\'Module Patch\',\'Native Patch\',\'Generate Patch\' And \'Save Patch\'.\n\nRemember :- Before Updating To New Version Click Unpatch And Then Update (Only Required On Kitkat And Below) And Patch Again (Required Only In Code Patch).

Use 32 Bit Instruction Set On 64 Bit Firmwares For Patching\n(Only Can Be Selected On 64 Bit Firmwares,Patcher Uses 64 Bit Instruction Set By Default On 64 Bit Firmwares For Patching,Enable This If Patch Does Not Result In Patching On 64 Bit Firmwares As Some Firmwares Uses 32 Bit Instruction Set Even Its 64 Bit Firmware)
Hide Patching Tools Like Lucky Patcher, Freedom, Game Killer From Other Apps\n(Requires Xposed Module Enabled And Rebooted)

Your Firmware Is 64 Bit.\n\nPatcher Uses 64 Bit Instruction Set By Default On 64 Bit Firmwares For Patching But Some Firmwares Uses 32 Bit Instruction Set Even Its 64 Bit Firmware So If Patch Does Not Result In Patching On 64 Bit Firmwares Then You Can Enable 32 Bit Instruction Set Available In Patcher\'s Settings Then Try Patching Again.
Settings Imported Successfully\nApplication Will Reload Now
No Settings Backup Found To Import\nAre You Sure Internal Location You Selected Is Right ?
Can\'t Export Settings As Directory Is Not Writable\nAre You Sure Internal Location You Selected Is Right ?
Settings Reset Successfully\nApplication Will Reload Now
Please Soft REBOOT The Device For Changes To Take Effect Properly!!
License Emulation And License Hook Can Not Be Selected Together,The Other One Is Turned Off Now..
Available Only In Premium Mode..\nPlease Enable Premium Mode From Donate Option In Patcher..

Can't Proceed, Xposed Not Found..

Did You Installed Xposed Framework And Enabled Patcher Module In It And Then Rebooted ?

Do Not Know What Is Xposed ?
Try Search Google.

Can't Emulate, Xposed Not Found..

Did You Installed Xposed Framework And Enabled Patcher Module In It And Then Rebooted ?

Do Not Have Xposed ? No Problem

You Can Still Use License Emulation And Billing Emulation With Root But You Need To Apply 'Support Emulate' Patch From Universal Patch To Target App And Also Keep In Mind Root Kind Of Emulation Is Not Even Close To Xposed Kind Of Emulation Which Is A Quality.

.......Details.......

 -> Patch :- Patch License Check Of The Target App, It Need To Be Unpatch Before Updating The Target App (Only Required On Kitkat And Below).

 -> Unpatch :- Remove Patch From The Target App, It Returns Target App To Normal Unlicensed State, Should Be Used To Remove Patch Before Updating The Target App (Only Required On Kitkat And Below).

 -> Installer Patch :- Installer Patch For Apps To Make App Think They Are Installed From Play Store, Should Be Applied First Before Using Either Patch Or Emulation.

 -> Support Emulate :- Patch Target App For License And Billing Emulation To Work With Root, If You Have Xposed Then You Do Not Need This As Xposed Module Will Take Care Of This Itself, It Is Alternate Of 'Select Apps' Option In Emulation.

 -> Remove Ads :- Remove Google Ads From The Target App.

 .......Note.......

 -> If You Apply Installer Patch And Patch Both Then Make Sure Installer Patch Should Be Applied First Before Patch.

 -> Only User Installed Apps Are Shown In List.

.......Details.......

 -> License Emulation :- It Does Not Require Play Store Installed Or Internet Connection And It Redirect License Check To Patcher, It Can Be Used Without Xposed But Require 'Support Emulate' Patch To Target App From Universal Patch UI.

 -> Billing Emulation :- It Does Not Require Play Store Installed Or Internet Connection And It Redirect Billing Purchase To Patcher, It Can Be Used Without Xposed But Require 'Support Emulate' Patch To Target App From Universal Patch UI.

 -> License Hook (Removed In v3.0) :- It Does Require Play Store Installed As Well As Internet Connection On Verification And It Will Intercept Play Store For Requests And Responses, Xposed Is Mandatory So Can Not Be Used Without Xposed.

 -> Select Apps :- Select The Apps You Want To Emulate, By Default All User Installed Apps Are Selected, If You Unselect Any App Then Even If Emulation Is Turned ON That App Won't Be Hooked, Should Be Used To Exclude Legal Bought Apps, It Require Xposed So If You Do Not Have Xposed Then Use 'Support Emulate' Option On Target App From Universal Patch Which Is Alternate Of This Option.

 -> Core Patch :- Core Patch Is Legacy Method Used For Bypassing At Response, By Default Patcher Uses Advanced Mechanism So After Enabling This Option Will Disable Advanced Mechanism Automatically.

 .......Note.......

 -> Always Check 'Store Purchase' Option While Purchasing A Non Consumable Item But Never In Consumable Item.
 Non Consumable :- Premium, Pro Etc In Apps.
 Consumable :- Coins, Gems Etc In Games.

 -> After Turning OFF Billing Emulation, Some Apps With Non Consumable Items Will Revert Back To Free State But When You Turn It ON Again It Will Be Back To Bought State, So It Is Better To Keep Billing Emulation Turned ON So It Work Reliable Because These Apps Keep Synchronizing Purchases.

 -> Also After Turning OFF License Emulation, Some Apps Ask For License Again Because They Keep Synchronizing License, So It Is Better To Keep License Emulation Turned ON So It Work Reliable.

 -> If You Have Legal License Or Legal Purchases, Either Only Select Those Apps You Want Emulation To Work On Or If You Selected All Apps For Emulation Then Turn OFF All License Emulation, Billing Emulation And License Hook Because Anyone Of Them Turned ON Will Create Problem In Legal License And Purchase, You Can Also Use Emulation On Your Real License Or Purchases It Will Work Fine In Most Of The Cases.

 -> Some Apps Use Old Licensing Library, When Licensing Emulation Is Turned On And App Is Not Even Selected In Per App Based List Still They Are Not Licensed From Legal License Because Patcher Interfere Due To Old LVL Library And Per App Based Selection Do Not Work So Turn Off Licensing Emulation And Now It Will Not Interfere In Any License Request, Once Licensed You Can Turn It On Back, Same Goes With Billing Emulation.

 -> If You Do Not Have Xposed Then You Can Use License And Billing Emulation With Root, It Requires 'Support Emulate' Patch From Universal Patch To Target App But Keep In Mind Root Kind Of Emulation Is Not Even Close To Xposed Kind Of Emulation Which Is A Quality.

 -> Some Applications Have Extra Checks So You Can Also Apply 'Installer Patch' From Universal Patch To Target App To Bypass Those Extra Play Store Installer Checks And Then Use Emulation.

 -> Emulation Does Not Need Soft Reboot, After Enabling Any Emulation Just Force Stop That App You Want Emulation To Work On, But It Is Better To Soft Reboot To Work Properly.
Disable Loading Of Application Icons And Use Default Icons Instead
Make All Apps Debuggable\nNOTE :- Even If Debuggable Property Of Apps Is False Or Not Present In Manifest.
Disable Debugger Connected Check\nNOTE :- Will Result In No Debugger Connected,Even If Debugger Is Connected.

Disable Android Version Check On Install\nNOTE :- Install The App Even If Your Android Version Is Less Than The Minimum Version App Requires.\nIt Works On Android Lollipop 5.0 And Above,On Below It May Work Or May Not.
Allow Downgrade Apps\nNOTE :- Install The Older Version Of App Over Newer Version Currently Installed.\nIt Works On Android Lollipop 5.0 And Above,On Below It May Work Or May Not.

Disable Signature Check\nNOTE :- Install The Same App With Different Signature Over Currently Installed With Other Signature.\nIt Works On Android Lollipop 5.0 And Above,On Below It May Work Or May Not.
Disable Signature Of APK\nNOTE :- Disable Signature Check While Installing APK So You Can Modify The Files Inside APK Without Signing It Again And Keeping The Old Developer Signature.
Disable Overlay Detected\nNOTE :- Bypass Overlay Detected Pop Up By Android While Granting Permissions Or Installing Apps.
Theme Changed Successfully\nApplication Will Reload Now
Virtual Xposed Detected But Module Is Not Enabled!\n\nOpen Xposed Installer In Virtual Xposed And Enable Patcher Module And Then Reboot Virtual Xposed From Menu.

Patcher Is FREE And Always Will Be FREE, I Started This Project As A Hobby And Fun Including Appetite To Gain More Knowledge And Experience.

We Have Come So Far Together And We Have Very Powerful Product In Our Hand, As We Know Maintaining Patcher Takes Efforts, It Has Made Me To Spend Some Real Money And A Lot Of Time On It Though I Don't Expect Anything But If You Can See My Hard Work Behind The Scene And You Think I Have Helped You In Someway Then I Would Really Appreciate If You Buy Me Some Coffee!

PS Donation Will Keep Me MOTIVATED To Work On Patcher's Updates And New Innovating Ideas.

Click DONATE NOW And You Will Be Redirected To My Blog For Possible Ways To Donate.

To Enable Premium Mode Click ENABLE PREMIUM To Unlock Premium Mode For Free.
Android 6+ Needs Display Over Other Apps Permission To Show Billing Popup, Please Grant It.
License And Billing Emulation Will Not Work Even After Enabled, Unless You Create Modified APK With Support Emulate!
Select APK To Create Modified APK With Support Emulate Patch!
Installing Command Processed, If You Click Install, Should Be Installed!
Disable Flag Secure\nNOTE :- Allow Video Recording And Screenshot In Protected Apps.
